forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy this morning with showers developing this afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 54F. NE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.
